metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7032 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
sudo_noexec.so in Sudo before 1.8.15 on Linux might allow local users tobypass intended noexec command restrictions via an application that callsthe (1) system or (2) popen function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.2
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sudo package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1.2').
